mapper.select: select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt, write_cnt, levels, enabled, profile, check_code from users where username=#{username}
select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt, write_cnt, levels, enabled, profile, check_code from users where email=#{email}
select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt, write_cnt, levels, enabled, profile, check_code from users where check_code=#{checkCode}
mapper.insert: insert into users (username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt, write_cnt, levels, enabled, profile, check_code) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{irum}, #{email}, sysdate, #{birthday}, 0, 0, #{level}, 0, #{profile}, #{checkCode})
mapper.delete: delete from users where check_code is not null
